resources.string: Hello, my name is Amzesmoro Sianturi, I come from Medan, North Sumatera Indonesia. You can contact me by: amzesmoro05@gmail.com
This is a simple app. This App is built to fulfill assignment of Week 3. I get the resources from: https://indonesia.go.id/profil/presiden-dan-wakil-presiden. Application Version: 1.0.0 :]
